name: quiz-tennis
description:
Create your own quizzes applications with the Quiz template! Works on iOS/Android mobiles and tablets.

The template is designed to run fullscreen in portrait mode on mobile devices and landscape mode on tablets, typically in a packaged application. It will adjust the layout to some extent when run in a Web browser.

Due to the use of specific device capabilities, the right pane preview is not available for this template. Please test the template directly on mobile/tablet devices.

The template takes a list of quizzes as input (up to 10) from a set of QTI datasources or a set of Google spreadsheets. Questions must have only one correct answer, and should not propose more than 6 choices for possible answers. Quizzes defined in a spreadsheet must follow the following rules:
1/ one question per row,
2/ first row contains the columns headers,
3/ the question label must be defined in a "Question" column,
4/ the URL of an image to display alongside the question may be given in an "Image" column,
5/ choices must be listed in "ChoiceX" columns where X ranges from 1 to 6,
6/ the right answer must be defined in an "Answer" column, set to the index of the correct answer, in other words a number from 1 to 6.

Question images should be at least 200x200. Square images are preferred but not mandatory. Two questions in a same quiz may propose a different number of choices, simply leave out the "choiceX" columns that you do not need.
